text: Aldo Rizzo (24 May 1935 â€“ 9 November 2021) was an Italian politician and lawyer. He was born in Palermo, Italy. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies between 1979 until 1992. Rizzo was also Mayor of Palmero between August 1992 and December 1992.
